raw_answer: 试题分析:∵MN是线段AB的垂直平分线,∴AN=BN,∵△BCN的周长7cm,∴BN+NC+BC=7(cm),∴AN+NC+BC=7(cm),∵AN+NC=AC,∴AC+BC=7(cm),又∵AC=4cm,∴BC=7-4=3(cm).故选C.
